name: Shendi Teuku Maulana Efendi
role: AI Engineer | Code Reviewer | Long Life Learner
about: Fresh Graduate in Informatics Engineering with strong expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Experienced in developing end-to-end MLOps pipelines, model deployment, and intelligent data systems. Passionate about crafting AI-driven solutions that bridge data, engineering, and innovation.

experience.title: Code Reviewer
experience.description: Served as an External Code Reviewer for Machine Learning and Data Science submissions, reviewing over 220 projects with an average rating of 4.99/5.00. Provided detailed feedback on code structure, modeling approaches, and clean code implementation. Contributed to 130+ forum discussions and verified learner solutions.

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Implemented an end-to-end MLOps pipeline for student performance prediction, automating ML workflows using GitHub Actions. Integrated MLflow for experiment tracking, deployed models with Docker, and built real-time monitoring dashboards using Prometheus and Grafana. Developed GoldSight, a GRU-based gold price prediction system achieving R² = 0.9971 and MAPE = 0.62%, integrated with news sentiment analysis and deployed via Streamlit.

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.description: Built risk classification models for stunting prediction in low birth weight and premature infants using Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and XGBoost. Conducted EDA, feature selection, and statistical analysis. Addressed data imbalance using SMOTE and evaluated models using ROC-AUC, Sensitivity, and Specificity.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
experience.company: DBS Bank Indonesia (DBS Foundation Coding Camp)
experience.description: Developed an end-to-end sarcasm detection pipeline using TensorFlow Extended (TFX). Implemented data ingestion, validation, and feature engineering with TF Transform, model training with Keras, and automated evaluation with TensorFlow Model Analysis. Performed hyperparameter tuning using KerasTuner.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: Analyzed Indonesia’s air quality data using K-Means Clustering and Decision Tree Regression. Identified key pollution patterns and trends and visualized insights through Looker Studio dashboards for policy recommendations.

projects.title: TB Detector
projects.description: Deep Learning–based web application leveraging DenseNet-121 to detect Tuberculosis from chest X-ray images. Optimized using ONNX Runtime and integrated into a full-stack web system built with Next.js and FastAPI.

projects.title: Netflix Recommender System
projects.description: A hybrid movie recommendation system combining collaborative filtering and content-based features. Features evaluation metrics such as RMSE and Precision@K, API serving, and demo UI for recommendations.

projects.title: GrabInsight – Sentiment Analysis on Ride-Hailing User Reviews
projects.description: An NLP project analyzing Grab user reviews to classify sentiments using TF-IDF, NLTK, and Lexicon-based methods. Provided business insights on user satisfaction and service improvement.

projects.title: GoldSight – Intelligent Gold Price Prediction Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive web platform for gold price forecasting using GRU neural networks and news sentiment analysis. Provides 90-day predictions with visualization dashboards and investment insights.

projects.title: SERASI Stunting Infant
projects.description: Collaborative project during MSIB at KOMDIGI in partnership with RSUD Dr. Soetomo. Developed machine learning models for predicting stunting risk in infants using clinical and health data.

certifications.title: AI Engineer
certifications.description: Professional certification focusing on end-to-end AI implementation, MLOps, and model deployment.

certifications.description: National competency certification covering data analysis, ML modeling, and data-driven decision-making.

certifications.description: Certification validating cloud-based big data proficiency in Alibaba Cloud’s ecosystem such as MaxCompute, DataWorks, and Quick BI.

certifications.title: Machine Learning Engineer (DBS Foundation)
certifications.description: Certification emphasizing ML pipeline building, model tuning, and production deployment.

certifications.description: Comprehensive ML certification path covering beginner to advanced topics including applied ML, deep learning, and MLOps.

certifications.description: Certification program on data analysis, machine learning, and visualization for data-driven decision-making.

certifications.description: Regional competition and certification assessing data analysis and storytelling skills using real ASEAN datasets.

certifications.description: Certification covering database design, normalization, and SQL implementation for data-driven applications.
